website_summaries.verdict: A great choice if you want a minimalist, reliable chalk bag with a phenomenal reputation.
pros: Drawstring close is extremely effective at keeping in chalk
Customers love its lightweight portability and small size
Comes with a removable belt for rock climbing
cons: Bag does not have a sturdy base – cannot stand upright on its own

customer_reviews.title: Foil Exterior Rubs Off on EVERYTHING! Disappointing...
customer_reviews.text: I am really disappointed in the quality of this chalk bag. I bought it a while back to use at an indoor gym and when I went to use it, I noticed the silver foil was peeling off!!! I haven’t even had an opportunity to use it yet and it has been stored in my closet with my other gear! It’s too late for me to return it at this point so I can only imagine what it’s going to look like after some wear and tear... Super sad about this, I really liked the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: I'm super happy I chose this one because it keeps chalk ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chalk bag because the logo was tiny and centered and it was blue and I wanted to sew a patch on it. However, I'm super happy I chose this one because it keeps chalk in very well, it's super soft, and it was pretty cheap!
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: lensball holder
customer_reviews.text: This pouch is the perfect size to hold my 80mm lensball and a few microfiber cloths. The pouch is puffy (protective fluffiness) and comes with a simple belt that I can sling around my head and one arm in order to keep my lensball accessible for spontaneous photography sessions.
customer_reviews.author: Big V

customer_reviews.title: Great Dog Training Treat Bag
customer_reviews.text: I cant speak to the intended use of this chalk bag but for carrying dog treats, it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: MissKitty

customer_reviews.title: I use it every climb but not with the waist strap.
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this bag for my climbing endeavors and really like the look of it. This bag is lightweight and the material is very solid (I am NOT afraid of it coming apart at the threads). It is rather small, which I personally like because carrying a giant bag of chalk up the wall seems bothersome. I do want to point out the the waist clip it comes with feels out of place and kind of cheap. It is a basic nylon strap with a plastic clip (which is nice if you are bouldering and do not want to wear a harness) but I would recommend just buying a good carabiner to clip it to your harness.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Fox

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Had to get a chalk bag before I went to JT and it works flawlessly and closes very well.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag
customer_reviews.text: I really like this design. Not too big, but easy to find and put your hand in. From previous (like a decade ago) experience, I was expecting a thicker weave on the outside material, like a synthetic canvas material, but it's more like the polyester you'd find on a pair of Nike running shorts. Nothing wrong with that, though.
customer_reviews.author: nathan hess

customer_reviews.title: ... my first chalk bag and I have not been disappointed with it
customer_reviews.text: This is my first chalk bag and I have not been disappointed with it. The cinch at the top keeps my chalk in very well. I accidentally put way too much chalk in it and it still holds it all in without spills. The waist strap is simple but works just fine. I rarely use it while bouldering, though. All in all, I would recommend this bag to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher H.

customer_reviews.title: Great color too
customer_reviews.text: Small and portable. Just the right size to go gym climbing with. Great color too, not obnoxious loud or bright. Materials seem of good quality, seems like it can last a long time even if used for outdoor climbing. Best thing is the draw tie that cinches up tight, read that from other reviews and that influenced my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JigglyTofu

customer_reviews.title: Tiny Tiny Bag
customer_reviews.text: I thought that I had small hands, apparently that isn't the case with this tiny ass bag. You'll likely be unable to reach both of your hands in the bag at the same time. Otherwise the bags ok, no leaking or issues sealing it up; decent bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad clip
customer_reviews.text: The belt clip doesn’t work. It wasn’t broken, it just wouldn’t click closed. I like the bag, no complaints there. It’s got a brush loop and it closes nice and tight, so I just replaced the clip on mine, but if you don’t feel like doing that (and why should you have to?) I wouldn’t buy this. I probably just got a lemon, but they’re your dice to roll.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Machen

customer_reviews.title: Good bag, not very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is a good bag, does its job well, however there are a few problems. The bag is advertised as light but this is because it is almost exclusively cloth, making it one of the least sturdy bags I've seen and I can't see it taking a lot of stress for a long time. Not only that, the draw string, you can open it with one hand but closing it again will most certainly take two, which is not always a pleasure you have on the wall. Beyond that, the belt works well, it holds chalk well and its a very good deal for a light bag with belt and drawstring.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Carter

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This seals great when not in use. The bag is perfect for a small sock ball.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Davids

customer_reviews.title: Love this chalk bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this chalk bag. Good size for kids and women. I rather have something small than a big bag dangling on my waist. We have two of them now
customer_reviews.author: Umi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, just what i was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I'm rather new to the rock climbing scene and was looking for a quality bag at a reasonable price that would last. So far this bag seems to be meeting expectations. It's very well built, felt/cloth inside, durable material outside. The belt it comes with has a very cheap buckle on it and the chord barely fits around my 36 inch waist, but if you plan to clip it to a harness it's no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Colin F

customer_reviews.title: Basic, solid chalk bag
customer_reviews.text: Solid bag. Everything you need in a chalk bag and nothing you don't.
customer_reviews.author: R. Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Big improvement
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a bag I bought at my local climbing gym; it was made by Metolius and the clasp broke IMMEDIATELY (no joke... first pull). This Prana replacement cost the same amount but is leaps and bounds ahead in quality. It's simple, no frills style is perfect for me. Frankly, I don't know how you would improve on this design.
customer_reviews.author: S. M. Pitman

customer_reviews.title: Climbing Isn't Supposed to be Clean!!
customer_reviews.text: I like the bag. It holds chalk, as it is designed to do. I only boulder indoors and do not keep the bag belted to me like some people prefer, so I can't really say anything about the belt portion. If I had to say anything negative about the bag, it would be that its fabric is soft and it slumps over, unlike other bags that remain stiff. Also, it tends to easily get dirty with chalk sticking to it, so if you want it to remain clean just clean it!
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: A Good Choice
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my daughter. She shopped around, compared products, and settled on this one. She is pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: BohemianGirl

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bag SUPER fast delivery!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bag SUPER fast delivery!!! This is a very nice bag...I am not a weight lifter or a rock climber so I don't really have much contrast to compare this bag to...I am a drummer and I hang this bag off my floor tom to keep my hands dry and keep drum sticks in my hand. I pouch/bag has a nice belt and it closes nice and tight!!
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Gaspar

customer_reviews.title: Loveeee it!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and the adjustable waist strap. Perfect size
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Broken clip in 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.text: The bag itself is pretty good. I use loose chalk and it doesn't fall out if you use the enclosure correctly, but the little snap that goes around your waist broke very very easily, and I'm not even sure how that happened. I've jerry rigged it with the cord from a lanyard, which surprising has been more durable, lasting over 6 weeks now.
customer_reviews.author: E. Chen

customer_reviews.title: Great chalk bag
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Love the rope that goes around as well. Lets me swing the bag where i want it instead of having it set on one caribiner.
customer_reviews.author: Tay

customer_reviews.title: I'm not a fan of the belts, so I ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a fan of the belts, so I just clip it on my harness with a carabiner. When bouldering, I just put the Caribbean into the back of my pants.
customer_reviews.author: brett

customer_reviews.title: it's a great bag. It's well assembled with quality materials
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, it's a great bag. It's well assembled with quality materials, I doubt it will wear out any time soon. The belt is shabby, but I don't use it. And if I did need a belt, I would attach it via some other means.
customer_reviews.author: Victory

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks cool when I climb and is adjustable so the whole family can use it
customer_reviews.author: Gina N

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a Xmas gift for my brother and he loves it. I love the quality, color is very earthy and looks fantastic. Overall, great product and functionality for a climber like my brother.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good bag for the price. Material is very soft so chalk clings to the outside. Belt and draw string function well and seem durable.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: it closes tight enough to not leak powder in the bag and has the rim open for easy grabbing when climbing
customer_reviews.text: It does the trick. So far no issues, it closes tight enough to not leak powder in the bag and has the rim open for easy grabbing when climbing.
customer_reviews.author: Neux Products

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for weightlifting, not rock climbing. I removed the waist strap (no cutting required) and just carry the bag to the gym. The top closes very tightly, so no chalk is every split or wasted. Serves its purpose!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waist belt is easy to tighten and would fit plenty of waist sizes
customer_reviews.text: I'm a regular climber and I still use this bag for rope climbing 4 years after purchase. Waist belt is easy to tighten and would fit plenty of waist sizes. Drawstring closure works perfectly and is still in great shape. Great chalk bag, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: I love this chalk bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this chalk bag. It seals really well, it's a great size and I like how it feels inside and out.
customer_reviews.author: Robosteff

customer_reviews.title: Great chalk bag for any climber
customer_reviews.text: Great chalk bag that holds a good amount of loose chalk or a decent sized chalk ball. The bag also closes tightly so chalk does not fly out
customer_reviews.author: rushofmusic

customer_reviews.title: Nice chalk bag
customer_reviews.text: Nice chalk bag, I am using it for indoor climbing and its great, the texture so as the fabric are excellent.. The cord is covert yo makes easy to open and close the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando

customer_reviews.title: Solid bag
customer_reviews.text: I lost my old black diamond bag and had to replace it before I hit the crag again. Prana did a really good job with this bag, and it's reflected in the build quality. Having the belt there made it even better. Could be a bit cheaper, but so could all chalk bags.
customer_reviews.author: S. Browning

customer_reviews.title: Quality chalk bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice chalk bag. The only small complaint I have is the seal is not the best. It ended up spilling in the back of my car. But other than that it is very sturdy feeling and looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Prince

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like others have said, the opening to the bag is a bit small. But otherwise a great chalkbag!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made in the USA, great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Nice little chalk bag, its not too big, holds quite a bit of chalk. The drawstring works well, it hasn't spilled much chalk at all. I would recommend to anyone who wanted something modest and useful.
customer_reviews.author: Mind Control

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase! I have small hands and this is very comfortable for me to reach into. The closure works great and the chalk doesn't spill out at all in my backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Small hand entry
customer_reviews.text: this is for small hands or women, very small hand entry, thought it was going to be bigger, depends on your hand size, too small for male with large hands.
customer_reviews.author: Kell

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Bag does it's job like it's supposed to do. No frills, simple, and attractive. I had no problem reaching in for chalk during a climb. It stayed on my harness just fine thanks to the buckle.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a leftover burrito in my gym bag but that's ok
customer_reviews.author: anonyme

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. simple Item well constructed. been buying Prana Items for over 10 years. Still have a jacket that's 10 years old. I'm sure I will have this for longer!
customer_reviews.author: Scoopburt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I needed a simple functional chalk bag, this is it! Big enough opening for my huge hands, string to shut it tight so I don't lose my powder when inverted, simple, functional, just what I was expecting! Fast shipping too. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Olivier Morency

customer_reviews.title: Great value. If you are looking for a small ...
customer_reviews.text: Great value. If you are looking for a small chalk bag, this is a great option.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonRocks

customer_reviews.title: Holds Chalk Well and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: No complaints as it hold the chalk without leaking, comfortable and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph H. Roberson

customer_reviews.title: High quality as expected from Prana
customer_reviews.text: Looks and feels high quality. Loops are double stitched and seem very durable. Adjustable opening and bouldering strap included.
customer_reviews.author: kevin kidwell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent gym use. I use this to hold my chalk. I generally use this during weight lifting and rock climbing.
customer_reviews.author: vmleopard

customer_reviews.title: Seems perfect for his hand size
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my budding climber nephew. Seems perfect for his hand size.
customer_reviews.author: K. Gonnella

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Chalk Bag
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of Prana chalk bags. The rim is nice n stiff so that the mouth of the bag always retains it's shape. The draw string is tough and pulls the opening closed quite tight. It doesn't leak nearly as much as other chalk bags do. The fleece interior helps get the chalk evenly distributed without wasting excessive amounts of chalk. I've had one of these since I started climbing years ago and my original is still in great shape. I don't plan to replace it any time soon, I just liked this model so much I bought another one to keep in my gym bag for the weight room.
customer_reviews.author: Dan F

customer_reviews.title: Prana delivers.
customer_reviews.text: Decent chalk bag that does what it's supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Works great! The feel is nice
customer_reviews.text: Works great! The feel is nice. Can clip on or use the belt. NO DUST gets out when it is closed. It has a tight seal.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Cady

customer_reviews.title: Good quality chalk bag
customer_reviews.text: I just needed a decent chalk bag and this was perfect for the job. The materials are nice and the drawstring is great to keep the chalk inside during transport.
customer_reviews.author: Eric C.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: High quality and suits it purpose nicely. I use to it hold dog treats while training my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Cena

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bag! Great size, very soft, and the belt is fantastic, overall a great chalk bag
customer_reviews.author: Ben Perry

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: This is a soft bag so the one risk I noticed may be in durability in outdoor climbing. For indoor climbing it is a light so naturally pretty ideal for bouldering . I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Kissel

customer_reviews.title: This chalk bag is very basic and adequately holds enough ...
customer_reviews.text: This chalk bag is very basic and adequately holds enough chalk for a day at the gym or local crag. While it is a bit smaller than other bags, it is still capable of accommodating a brush for bouldering and is extremely lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise excellent. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat small opening; hard to fit larger hands. Otherwise excellent. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: azure.raptor

customer_reviews.title: Well-made
customer_reviews.text: We gave this to my son for Christmas. He is quite happy with it. It is practical and looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Great chalk bag for the  price
customer_reviews.text: You can't go wrong with prana, excellent feel and size in the hand. Great colour options. thinking in getting another one
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Malacara

customer_reviews.title: Great Chalk Bag
customer_reviews.text: Simple chalk bag that does what is suppose. The bag holds enough Chalk for a bunch of climbs and is just the right size so you can fit your entire hand inside.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Very nice chalk bag
customer_reviews.text: The quality is great, and the size of the opening fits my hand perfectly; however, if you do have big hands, I think the opening will not be sufficiently big enough for you....
customer_reviews.author: zhongpan007

customer_reviews.title: basic, functional chalk bag
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why they needed to make it so soft, but it sure is. Plenty deep and drawstring works great.
customer_reviews.author: Cbots

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and works well!
customer_reviews.text: The color is just like the picture, the bag is well made and does its job. Not sure why it's called men's. My chose it and is happy using it.
customer_reviews.author: Paddock

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my gym bag chalk free.
customer_reviews.text: It works and it's cheap. It feels just the right size when I'm bouldering and I would definitely order another should I ever need one (seems sturdy though so I probably won't need to!).
customer_reviews.author: Alban Ng

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for kids / small hands
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a young climber, works great for little hands and looks good. The bag was great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: A.V.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I like very much the product and it is serve me very well thank you very much! And the service was also great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: great bag, gets the job done. I just use it at a climbing gym so I don't really use the belt feature but nice to have.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Fleisch

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again if I had lost it.
customer_reviews.text: It's my go to chalk bag. Stylish looking and functional.
customer_reviews.author: Chadwick

customer_reviews.title: Good bag. A tad more expensive than the stores like mec. I later found out
customer_reviews.text: Good bag. A tad more expensive than the stores like mec. I later found out
customer_reviews.author: david De Francesca

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Chalk bags are all pretty much the same, it gets the job done. A good size, decent price, arrived quickly, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Brossi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, and not just for men :)
customer_reviews.text: I use it for bouldering. There is a cloud of chalk powder every time I jump off the wall, but that's because I keep it open.
customer_reviews.author: Kate T

customer_reviews.title: Good size opening for hand access / does its job
customer_reviews.text: Opening is good for hand access, and can be cinched down to prevent chalk from falling out. No complaints, does its job.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag for the price. The only reason I gave it a 4 is because the outside does get dirty fairly easy.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable chalk-bag for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have no negatives to say about this bag. I have only been using it for a month, so I don't know about it's durability overall. None of the fabrics or components are remarkably impressive. However, I bought it as an affordable but reasonable chalk bag, and that is exactly what I've found it to be. It holds chalk well, my hand fits inside nicely (people with larger hands haven't complained in the rare cases they've borrowed it) and it seems to be of decent quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: JenJamin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it, haven't had any problems with it. Good size
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and Good
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what a chalk bag is supposed to do. I don't understand why anyone would buy a more expensive one. This one works great!
customer_reviews.author: Mark J. Lauman

customer_reviews.title: Good bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag is perfect my hand fits right into it with no problem I can get the right amount of chalk every time The reason I gave this a 4 star review instead of 5 was because the outside of the bag soaks up chalk and turns white. This doesn't bother me to much but I've heard other people complain about this
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and doesn't leak chalk. Looks like it does in the picture, there really isn't anything bad to say!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: soft like a baby
customer_reviews.text: It is mad out of some really nice material. Reminds you of a soft blanket. Has nothing to do with its usefulness, but it looks good. It does its job
customer_reviews.author: kevyn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good bag but a bit small for my large hands
customer_reviews.author: Sultanofslide

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for weightlfting
customer_reviews.text: This bag is perfect for going to the gym and it's not as messy as a chalk ball and much more convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Adan V

customer_reviews.title: Other than that's its great.
customer_reviews.text: I wish it had a pocket. Other than that's its great.
customer_reviews.author: ALi

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a bag that had a sturdier base that could stand upright on its own. Thisbag doesn't do that.
customer_reviews.author: Yas

customer_reviews.title: bought for a gift so who knows
customer_reviews.text: By a route obscure and lonely, Haunted by ill angels only, Where an Eidolon, named NIGHT, On a black throne reigns upright, I have wandered home but newly From this ultimate dim Thule.
customer_reviews.author: kevin l

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, I haven't tested it out yet
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, I haven't tested it out yet, but I think it'll replace my current chalk bag with no problem. Looks sturdy and reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality and gets completely covered in chalk after first use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag thinking that prAna would make a decent chalk bag. However this thing is a piece of junk. If you get a little bit of chalk anywhere on the outside of this bag, it stays there. The entire bag looks grey and covered in chalk even though I did my absolute best not to even touch the outside when using it. The top of the bag is a nightmare to keep clean as well. To clean it, I have to close the bag and beat it on the ground to get the dust off and it's still dirty. Don't get this bag. You've been warned.
customer_reviews.author: T. D.

product_meta.title: prAna Chalk Bag With Belt
product_meta.description: The prAna Chalk Bag with Belt is designed with an adjustable drawcord closure. This fleece-lined chalk bag also has double belt loops for stability and an elastic brush holder. Belt included. 6.5" wide x 6.5" tall.
